name: server
description: Training of using Node.js Server. Authorization based on tokens. Public and private middleware.

scripts.dev-db: echo "MongoDB instance for DEVELOPMENT on PORT: 27018" && mongod --port 27018 --dbpath ./db
scripts.serve-dev: SET PORT=8000&&SET DEBUG=true&&SET NODE_ENV=development&& nodemon index.js
